title: Upon the blessed return of our gracious sovereign King Charles the Second. Presented to his sacred Majesty by a person of honour the next day.
author: Lawson, John, M.D.
notes: Signed at end: Johan. Lawson. M.D. de Coll. Lond.
Verse - "What pen in sitting to salute a King?".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
The proeme -- The wish -- Charles Stuart anagramme -- The embleme of our English times -- The concluding emblem.
